summary: A list of few animations that you can use for your RPG.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds some animations on the powers section(sit, drink, eat, whistles and others). 

THE ANIMATION LIST ARE UNDER \"POWERS\" WITH A PREFIX: [An] 
USE IT WITH THE \"VOICE\" BUTTON 

FOR SIT AND DRINK/EAT ANIMATION: 
you have to use it NEAR(or *better* IN FRONT OF) a chair or a bench, the animation make the rest. 
warning: 
1) not work on bench with table and some other bench 
2) does not work on a bench already in use by another NPC, even if there are free places to sit 
you have to use it on a free bench/chair. 


the list is long, so try them yourself!:-) 

for the my UI screenshot: 
ive the italian version of skyrim, so my UI is in italian.. 
anyway: Poteri = Powers :D 

if you like it, please vote!:D 

update 1.2: 
i\'ve added the chairs from Dragonborn dlc if you have it, but *IS NOT REQUIRED*. 
in the other DLC (Dawnguard & Heartfire) i dont see any new chair..so i think should work. 

update 1.33 
added 4 new animations and the script to check the new version loaded. 
i hope nobody have problem :-D
author: AlterEgo
